INSERT INTO t_role_permission (serial_id, permission_id, role_id,create_time, create_id, modify_time,modify_id, notes) VALUES
(#{item.serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.modifyId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.notes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
